cache.description: A URL describing a cache service for mpd-now-playable to use. Supported protocols are memory://, redis://, and memcached://.

host.description: The hostname or IP address of your MPD server. If you're running MPD on your local machine, you don't need to configure this.

password.description: The password required to connect to your MPD instance, if you need one.

port.description: The port on which to connect to MPD. Unless you're managing multiple MPD servers on one machine for some reason, you probably haven't changed this from the default port, 6600.
